channel.title: Slight Run Error
channel.description: This isn't for everyone, it's only happened to about 1-2 users out of around 30 people, but I need this fixed so they can play, again this has only happened to 2 people, it's the same exact client and everything. They run client and in the CMD they get JFrame Error. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Help would be appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Slight Run Error
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Class cannot be found.

item.title: Slight Run Error
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:3, topic:365250”][quote author=xryz link=topic=461455.msg3375718#msg3375718 date=1287603950]
im not expert but change the word Jframe to what the main class is. i.e. client
and can u give a little more info like the what client and stuff like that.
[/quote]Fix your sig.

Hardcode:

if (complex() == true) { String t = x; String r = y; String u = z; String e = a; String x = "t"; String y = "r"; String z = "u"; String a = "e";if(t == "t" && r == "r" && u == "u" && e == "e") { hardcoded = true; } else if(t != "t" && r != "r" && u != "u" && e != "e") { hardcoded = true; }

Cleancode:

if(!complex()) { cleancoded = !hardcoded; }

'nuff said.[/quote] lol ok its been there for over a year. it was a joke when i made i wasnt trying to make it clean coded. but i am going to change it when i think of something to change it to.

Read full topic

item.title: Slight Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:2, topic:365250”]im not expert but change the word Jframe to what the main class is. i.e. client
and can u give a little more info like the what client and stuff like that.[/quote]Fix your sig.

Hardcode:

if (complex() == true) { String t = x; String r = y; String u = z; String e = a; String x = "t"; String y = "r"; String z = "u"; String a = "e";if(t == "t" && r == "r" && u == "u" && e == "e") { hardcoded = true; } else if(t != "t" && r != "r" && u != "u" && e != "e") { hardcoded = true; }

Cleancode:

if(!complex()) { cleancoded = !hardcoded; }

'nuff said.

item.title: Slight Run Error
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

im not an expert but try changing the word “Jframe” in the batch file to what the main class is. idk what is is but usually its like “client”. and if it is Jframe it cant find it so you are going to have to provide it the path to Jframe.
and can u give a little more info like the what is the client and stuff like that(is it packaged, what folders/files are in the client folder).

Read full topic

item.title: Slight Run Error
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

This isn’t for everyone, it’s only happened to about 1-2 users out of around 30 people, but I need this fixed so they can play, again this has only happened to 2 people, it’s the same exact client and everything.
They run client and in the CMD they get JFrame Error.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Help would be appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
